mapper.insert: insert into joinperson(email, grno, sno) values(#{email}, #{grno}, #{sno})
mapper.select: select schedule.sno as sno, user.name as uName, profile.name as pName, profile.dir as pDir, profile.uuid as pUuid from joinperson join schedule on schedule.sno=joinperson.sno join user on user.email=joinperson.email join profile on profile.email=user.email
